column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Who would complain about this place?!  Awesome pizza!  Yes
column2: it is pricey and yes you may wait for a long time to sit down
column3: that's because it is that awesome of a place!  Yes
column4: you will wait 45 minutes for a pizza
column5: order a head of time if you are that impatient or order a salad while you wait!
